text: Banks have paid in a first instalment of almost 8,000,000 in response to the Budgette appeal. About another 70,000,000 is due by September 20. For nearly a year about 150,000,000 has been frozen. MR. KRUSCHEV raises the bogy of German militarism in his replies to the West on Berlin. And he repeats that the problem 'must be solved this year.'
handwritten_text: Banks have paid in a first instalment of almost 8,000,000 in response to the Budgette appeal. About another 70,000,000 is due by September 20. For nearly a year about 150,000,000 has been frozen. MR. KRUSCHEV raises the bogy of German militarism in his replies to the West on Berlin. And he repeats that the problem 'must be solved this year.'
